original_text: Ye have not left your brethren these many days unto this day, but have kept the charge of the commandment of the Lord your God.
korean_text: 오늘까지 날이 오래도록 너희가 너희 형제를 떠나지 아니하고 오직 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 명령하신 그 책임을 지키도다

sentences.original_text: Ye have not left your brethren
these many days unto this day
of the commandment of the Lord your God
